textos_fuente.text: Reviews | Ovation Bistro & Bar Locations Lakeland Winter Haven Davenport Our Menu Specials About Us Catering Large Parties Gift Cards Priority Seating O-Club Rewards Reviews What others think Very unique dining experience with great food and ambiance. The French Onion Soup is extremely noteworthy. The staff is very friendly and helpful. It's like having a restaurant at a friends home... if they filled every room of their home with dining tables. I have never had anything here I didn't enjoy. ~ Jana Had a work holiday function here and food was wonderful, service was good and building itself inside is just beautiful. Will definitely return. ~ Lenny S. Tell us how we did! We enjoy hearing from our customers! Tell us about your latest experience with us, what you loved or what we can do to improve. Ovation Bistro & Bar Menu | Featuring Smoked Prime Rib, BBQ, Fish, Pasta & More Locations Lakeland Winter Haven Davenport Our Menu Specials About Us Catering Large Parties Gift Cards Priority Seating O-Club Rewards Our Menu Discover the renowned Ovation Bistro & Bar, a top-rated smokehouse celebrated for its Smoked Prime Rib. Explore our menu, featuring mouthwatering ribs, in-house smoked meats, craft burgers, juicy steaks, smokehouse sandwiches, and a delectable array of BBQ, Woodfire Grill, Fish, Pasta, and Chicken selections, setting the standard in Polk County cuisine. Make A Reservation Our Menu Menu Selections Appetizers Handhelds Steak & Ribs Combinations Woodfire Grill Chef Selections Fish Entree Salads Pasta Side Salads Sides Kids Menu Desserts Drinks Gluten Free Lunch Brunch Catering Appetizers Any One Of The Starters Will Take Your Tastebuds To The Next Level Smokehouse Potato Skins 6 Potato Skins Loaded With Cheese, Bacon And Chives, Served With Our Sour Cream And Choice Of House-Smoked Chicken, Certified Angus Beef® Beef Or Pork Tribute Shrimp Seasoned And Grilled Shrimp, Served On A Bed Of Lettuce With Our Homemade Remoulade For Dipping Grilled Shrimp 8 Large Shrimp, Seasoned And Grilled, Served On A Bed Of Lettuce BBQ Nachos Our award winning appetizer made with house kettle chips piled high with homemade cheese sauce, smoked crispy bacon, chives, and choice of chicken, Certified Angus Beef® or pork. Creamy Buffalo Chicken Dip Homemade Chicken Dip, Blue Cheese Crumbles And Chives Served With Crispy Kettle Chips Cheese Fries Crispy Fries With Melted Monterey Jack And Cheddar Cheese, Topped Warm Bacon And Served With Ranch For Dipping BBQ Flatbread BBQ Sauce, Cheese, Bacon, Onions And Cilantro With Choice Of Chicken, Certified Angus Beef® Beef Or Pork Guinness Beer Cheese & Pretzel Bread Crafted Guinness Draught Cheese is a nitrogen-infused, ruby red, Irish stout beer with a creamy, smooth, and balanced taste, combined with 5 creamy cheeses and served with warm fluffy pretzel bread for dipping. Available Thursdays at all locations after 4pm. 10lbs and 20lbs Smoked Prime Rib Roasts are available for pick-up/to-go all days. Order a Roast HERE! Remember Diablo Does Mean Devil And Del Mar Means Of The Sea, Caution! Ovation Bistro & Bar - Polk County - Visit Central Florida Skip to content Go to VISIT CENTRAL FLORIDA SPORTS Open main menu Close main menu Deals & Specials Welcome Center Meetings & Conventions Travel Guide Blog Search Search for submit Events See & Do Eat & Drink Stay Cities & Towns Meetings Deals & Specials Facebook Twitter Pinterest Instagram YouTube Ovation Bistro & Bar Ovation Bistro & Bar in Davenport serves barbecue, steaks, seafood and more. Popular dishes include ribs, BBQ chicken and smoked meats. Visit their website for daily specials. See more of what Visit Central Florida has to offer. Stay up to date with our facebook! Give us a like. At Ovation Bistro & Bar, we are unashamedly passionate about the food and drinks we create. As a family owned and operated business, we are always ready to serve! Our mouthwatering ribs and in-house smoked meats have earned us serious street cred among locals and visitors alike, and for good reason. Sit back and relax with a refreshing drink in our warm and casual atmosphere. Our wait staff is not only friendly but inviting as well. Voted the #1 restaurant in Davenport, and the Best Smokehouse in Central Florida, we guarantee Ovation Bistro & Bar will never disappoint you! We look forward to serving you and thank you in advance for giving us the chance. Our names are Joel & Fernando and we own and operate the Ovation Bistro & Bar Restaurants in Polk County. We do it together with our awesome managers and Ovationers, which work so hard to serve the best meals in Polk County. We grew up in Polk County and having worked hard all our lives (not complaining). Our family was a migrant family that moved and worked in the fields all across this great country of ours. The season would determine where we would be, up north in the summer months, Indiana or New York. In the Florida orange groves during the rest of the year, we never complained and in fact are still very proud of work that our parents did to provide for us. We have black and white pictures of them working in the fields in every one of our restaurants. To remind us, what hard work looks like and to remind us that in the United States anything is possible. We were both born and raised in Haines City, FL and both graduated from Haines City High and it was always a dream of ours to have our own business in the area. Always being a have not, we thought, it would be cool to have something one day. After high school, we both joined the military. We both served in the Army and both are Combat Veterans. We actually both served together in Afghanistan and after returning back home in 2006, we both went back to work as cooks and then managers at a big Australian themed steakhouse. This is where we learned our way and the ins and outs of the restaurant business, eventually running our own locations. Managing a restaurant is hard work and long hours, but also fun. Having a passion for BBQ and steaks and enjoying nice wines and whiskies… we asked ourselves, “why can’t we go somewhere to get real good BBQ and have a nice glass of wine or stiff drink?” So we decided one day, while we were smoking some brisket at home that we were going to open our own restaurant, one that was BBQ based but felt like a steakhouse and not like a quick service restaurant. Our new restaurant would not only have great BBQ, but a comfortable atmosphere, a sizeable wine list, full bar, specialty coffees and desserts, we told ourselves, this was in late 2014. ADDRESS 42605 US-27 Davenport,  33837 CONTACT INFO info@ovationbistro.com 863-354-6967 Visit Website TripAdvisor Traveler Rating 1587 reviews JUL 13, 2025 18:10:36 Worst restaurant every… We always researched places based on reviews and this one has the best. But please don’t be fool like us. The food was a disaster and the waiter worst. He got us the check... JUN 10, 2025 04:37:08 We was introduced to this place by friends who live in davenport. Fantastic food. Brisket and chicken fabulous. Service by Jason very good. Great value and nice atmosphere.
Would highly recommend... APR 25, 2025 17:50:53 Our final fling after 3 weeks in Florida and this was our blow out meal. 2lb of wings (possibly maybe 8 wings per lb) VERY loaded skins, 2 full racks of ribs which frankly had no business having THAT... Large Party Private Event Dining | Ovation Bistro & Bar Locations Lakeland Winter Haven Davenport Our Menu Specials About Us Catering Large Parties Gift Cards Priority Seating O-Club Rewards Private Event Dining Ovation Bistro & Bar locations offer private rooms, called Wilbur Hall, that can accommodate parties from 6-36 guests for your private event. Our team can make your occasion even more special with our delicious food and excellent service. Reserve Wilbur Hall WILBUR HALL Event Space for all Occasions Whether it's a special occasion or a business meeting, our dedicated team ensures an unforgettable experience with delicious food, exceptional service, and conference room amenities. Wilbur Hall Private Dining Spaces are available at all Ovation Bistro & Bar locations! Private Dining Room Perfect For: Anniversaries Birthdays Cultural Events Team Gatherings Holidays Fundraising Award Ceremonies Networking Events Wedding Receptions Reserve Wilbur Hall BUSINESS MEETINGS & CONFERENCES Have your next sales meeting over lunch or dinner, or host an award ceremony for your employees. Wilbur Hall is not only perfect for private events, but it is also equipped with conference room equipment, monitors, and TVs making it an ideal location for business meetings. The best part?!? There's no fee to rent the rooms, only purchase minimums; which vary by time and date. Wilbur Hall at Ovation Bistro & Bar is cheaper than renting a hotel conference room...and we feed you! Reserve Wilbur Hall ***Pharmaceutical Reps*** Please reach out directly to our Events Coordinator, John Jonson, to create a custom package that works within the requirements of your Letter of Authorization. About Ovation Bistro & Bar | The Best Smokehouse in Central Florida Locations Lakeland Winter Haven Davenport Our Menu Specials About Us Catering Large Parties Gift Cards Priority Seating O-Club Rewards About Us Voted the #1 Restaurant In Davenport, and The Best Smokehouse In Central Florida, we guarantee Ovation Bistro & Bar will never disappoint you! We look forward to serving you and thank you in advance for giving us the chance. Our Story Hello, Our names are Joel & Fernando and we own and operate the Ovation Bistro & Bar Restaurants in Polk County. We do it together with our awesome managers and Ovationers, which work so hard to serve the best meals in Polk County. We grew up in Polk County and having worked hard all our lives (not complaining). Our family was a migrant family that moved and worked in the fields all across this great country of ours. The season would determine where we would be, up north in the summer months, Indiana or New York. In the Florida orange groves during the rest of the year, we never complained and in fact are still very proud of work that our parents did to provide for us. We have black and white pictures of them working in the fields in every one of our restaurants. To remind us, what hard work looks like and to remind us that in the United States anything is possible. We were both born and raised in Haines City, Florida and both graduated from Haines City High and it was always a dream of ours to have our own business in the area. Always being a have not, we thought, it would be cool to have something one day. After high school, we both joined the military. We both served in the Army, and are Combat Veterans We actually both served together in Afghanistan and after returning back home in 2006, we both went back to work as cooks and then managers at a big Australian themed steakhouse. This is where we learned our way and the ins and outs of the restaurant business, eventually running our own locations. Managing a restaurant is hard work and long hours, but also fun. Having a passion for BBQ and steaks and enjoying nice wines and whiskies... we asked ourselves, “Why can’t we go somewhere to get real good BBQ and have a nice glass of wine or stiff drink?” So we decided one day, while we were smoking some brisket at home that we were going to open our own restaurant, one that was BBQ-based but felt like a steakhouse and not like a quick service restaurant. Our new restaurant would not only have great BBQ, but a comfortable atmosphere, a sizeable wine list, full bar, specialty coffees and desserts. We told ourselves this in late 2014. We did it! We jumped off the big ship onto a small raft and the Ovation Bistro & Bar was born! We opened the first location in a little strip mall in Davenport. By grace and hard work our raft is still floating all these years later. We have opened two more locations since 2014 and we have been blessed to receive the support of the local communities that we are in, Davenport, Winter Haven and now Lakeland. Serving More Than Just Meals: How the Ovation Bistro Foundation Gives Back At Ovation Bistro & Bar, great food is only part of the story. Through the Ovation Bistro Foundation, giving back to the Polk County community isn’t just something we do, it’s something we believe in. To date, the Ovation Bistro Foundation has contributed over 200,000 meals to Feeding America Tampa Bay , helping fight food insecurity across Central Florida. But our impact doesn’t stop there. We’ve supported dozens of local charities, awarded scholarships to students, and donated food to high schools, the Sheriff’s Office, and community organizations across the region. From serving BBQ to first responders to helping students achieve their dreams, our mission is simple: be a place that brings people together, inside and outside our restaurants. Thank You For Your Time We are in the restaurants on days that end in “y”; so chances are, if you come by we will be there! We look forward to meeting you, Joel & Fernando We want to offer you a nice welcome; this would include a free Margherita Flatbread when you sign up for our O-Club. Ovation Bistro & Bar in Davenport, FL - Reunion Vacation Homes Rentals All Properties Orlando Rentals Recommended Rentals Signature Home Rentals Signature Condo Rentals New Rentals Best Value Rentals Browse By Room Count 3 Bed Condos & Town Homes All Condos Orlando Resorts All Resorts Reunion Resort Solterra Resort The Retreat at Champions Gate Windsor at Westside Solara Resort Windsor Island Resort Storey Lake Resort Formosa Gardens Windsor Hills Veranda Palms Bella Vida Emerald Island Providence Golf Resort Solana Resort Watersong Regal Palms Paradise Palms Sonoma Resort Reunion Resort Specials About Us About Us Property Management Area Guide Real Estate Reunion Videos Orlando Attraction Tickets Guest Reviews Concierge Services Terms & Conditions Area Map 3D-Tours blog Management 1-855-453-5400 UK: 44 8081 647990 Local: 321-323-7810 Ovation Bistro Food & Beverages 11-27-2017 Smokehouse Cuisine Orlando, Florida is a famous cultural hub in the United States. This is illustrated by nothing better than the diverse cuisine that you can find throughout the city. Ovation Bistro is an amazing restaurant where you can see many of these cuisines come together on one menu. You can find all types of food here, but it is an absolute must-visit if you are looking for smokehouse cuisine. Incredible Food The menu is extensive and diverse to the point where you can fall in love with something new each and every time you come back. You can never go wrong with the ribs or the steak, as they are all made from the highest quality cuts of meat and cooked to perfection. Combination plates featuring these, along with brisket and chicken, are some of the most popular items ordered. But specials like Pork Shank Osso Buco and New Zealand Lamb Chops will change your appreciation for food. It is for the quality of these menu items that Ovation Bistro has been voted the #1 smokehouse in all of central Florida. While the menu is constantly packed with unique and delicious meals, the rotating chef selections and specials are what keep people coming back again and again. To complement the amazing food served in the bistro, you will also find a meticulously crafted drink menu. You can find a wide selection of local craft beers and classic domestics on tap, and you can find wine from all over the world. But the specialty cocktails offer something truly unique, like their take on the Long Island Iced Tea in the Ovation Iced Tea and the Blackberry Agave Margarita. You cannot go wrong with this drink menu. Much More than a Great Menu The quality of Ovation Bistro goes far beyond delicious food. The experience of enjoying a meal here is made all the sweeter by the friendliness and attention to detail of the wait staff. The philosophy of inviting and friendly service is very apparent in each and every interaction with all staff, from the bussers to the general manager. Call in for a reservation at (863) 354-6967 or send them an email at davenport@ovationbistro.com to give them some feedback on your experience. Or you can just swing by for a drink and delicious meal at their Davenport location at 42605 US-27 Davenport, FL 33837 or their Winterhaven location at 7130 Cypress Gardens Blvd Winterhaven, FL 33884. After one visit, you are sure to become a regular!
